about.title: About Jazmine Dean Perez
about.subtitle: Professional Surfer & Instructor
about.bio: Jazmine Dean is a professional surfer representing Team Puerto Rico with an impressive competitive record. Based in the world-renowned surf town of Rincón, she brings years of experience and passion to every lesson.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Take Every Surfer To The Next Level
mission.lead: At Sunset Surf Academy our mission is simple: to help every surfer — from complete beginners to seasoned competitors — progress, have more fun, and get better results in the water.
mission.body1: We believe surfing is for everyone. For first-timers we focus on water safety, confidence-building and the fundamentals so your first waves are empowering and memorable. For intermediate and advanced surfers we offer technique work, video analysis and competition preparation that targets measurable improvement.
mission.body2: Our coaches design lessons around your goals — whether that’s catching your first wave, improving your bottom turns, boosting aerials, or nailing contest-worthy maneuvers. We emphasize clear coaching, practical drills, and a supportive environment that accelerates learning while keeping the stoke alive.
mission.conclusion: Ultimately, success at Sunset Surf Academy isn’t just measured in scores; it’s measured in smiles, confidence and the endless pursuit of better surfing. Come surf with us and let’s take your surfing to the next level.

questions.question: Where do we meet for lessons?
questions.answer: We are based out of Rincón, Puerto Rico, and primarily conduct lessons at our local beach breaks. However, when conditions are favorable and upon request, we're happy to travel anywhere along the coast from Rincón up to Jobos and all the spots in between to find the perfect waves for your lesson.

questions.question: What's included in beginner lessons?
questions.answer: Beginner lessons include surfboard rental, comprehensive safety briefing, personalized coaching both on the beach and in the water, and photos of your surf session to capture your progress and memorable moments.

questions.question: What's included in advanced coaching?
questions.answer: Advanced coaching is a comprehensive multi-session program that includes video analysis of your surfing. We start with a baseline session where we film your surfing, then review the footage together to identify areas for improvement. This is followed by a theory-to-practice session where you apply the techniques we've discussed, creating a complete learning cycle for advanced skill development.

questions.question: Can I reschedule my lesson?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer flexible rescheduling options based on weather conditions and your availability.

questions.question: Are lessons suitable for complete beginners?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Our beginner lessons are specifically designed for first-time surfers of all ages.

questions.question: Do you offer group and family lessons?
questions.answer: Yes, we welcome groups and families. Contact us for special group rates and custom arrangements.

questions.question: What's your refund policy?
questions.answer: We offer full refunds for cancellations due to unsafe weather conditions. Other cancellations require 24-hour notice.
